item.description:
Since so many of you were disappointed that I didn't schedule a Music Meetup for December, I decided to go ahead and create one! :)

MUSIC:
Regular Monday Morning Music Meetup from 10-10:30am, as we've done before.

HOLIDAY PARTY and Book Reading:
Let's do a little holiday party afterwards. If we all bring a little something, I will read "Twas the Night Before Christmas" and you can have some music instruments as "props" to make sound effects! Sound good?

CHARITY -- Adopt-a-Family (United Way)
(You are in NO WAY obligated to contribute to this if you come to the meetup, so don't let that stop you from the music!) But, I just thought this is a great LOCAL charity and any money we raise will be well used:

My friend, Suzanne Choate, sent me the following message about Adopt-A-Family. She is collecting donations and then doing the shopping for these local girls in need. Read on:
"This year my gift to some people on my list is to give to charity. I've chosen the Adopt-A-Family program through United Way. They have directed me to New Hope Manor in Manchester where troubled teen girls are housed in a residential setting. I am fulfilling a couple of girls wish lists, but there are more available....Just an idea...I will do the shopping!"

I suggest a donation of $5 or more, but please feel free to give anything you can. Suzanne is a skilled shopper and will make the most of the funds we raise, no matter how much or how little.



Here's the normal spiel:

Looking to meet other parents, and make friends for your kids, while having fun?

For Parents of Children ages birth-5!

Join us for 30 minutes of Family Style Music activities, followed by casual "getting to know you's"!


  • Great music for young children and adults--no boring or annoying music here!
  • Relaxed class, where the only rules are to have fun and be safe!
  • Meet other area parents with similar interests!
  • Babies, toddlers, and preschoolers are all welcome!
  • Perfect for siblings!

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: M.M.M.M.M. (MusicMakers Monday Morning Music Meetup!)
